### RCMP Dease Lake Detachment Expansion and Renovation Construction Services

#### Reference Number: PW-22-01009338

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites eligible contractors to submit a bid for the provision of construction services including the renovation and expansion of an existing federal building located at 41 Boulder Avenue, Dease Lake, British Columbia. The scope of work comprises a total area of 816.5 m2, including approximately 307 m2 of renovations and 509.5 m2 of expansion.

**Bidding Requirements**

The bid submission will consist of two phases: a qualifications and experience phase; and a pricing phase. Interested contractors are required to submit a Phase One bid that includes information on their qualifications and experience, as outlined in the solicitation document. Following evaluation, successful contractors will be advised of their standing and invited to submit a Phase Two bid, which will cover pricing.

The successful contractor must perform the work within 135 weeks from the date of contract award.

**Evaluation Criteria**

The RCMP will evaluate Phase One bids based on the information provided in accordance with the solicitation document. The evaluation will be conducted to ensure that bidders meet the necessary qualifications and experience requirements.

**Government Contracting**

The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada, which applies to all contracting activities, including this procurement.

**Important Dates**

* Bid submission deadline: November 3rd, 2022 at 5:00 PM (Pacific Time)
* Notice URL: Not Applicable

**Tender Documents**

Tender documents for this solicitation can be downloaded from [the link provided](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/05/0b4deb8b609892c5c95fad1d15c24022/en_itt_ph1_dease_lake_construction_-_soliciation_number_202301790a_.pdf).
